author: makortel
body:
This PR suggests two small updates to tracking MC validation scripts
* Include pulls, resolutions, and chi2 to the extended plots of "built tracks"
  * They have always been part of the standard plots of "general tracks", but have not been included for "built tracks" because there was no interest on them before
* Add help to `makeTrackValidationPlots.py` what needs to be done on the CMSSW configuration side to get the timing plots with `FastTimerService`

Tested in CMSSW_10_2_0, no changes expected in standard workflows.

@hajohajo @VinInn @mtosi @JanFSchulte
title: Minor updates to tracking MC validation scripts
